i liked Dumb and Dumber (1994) and Office Space (1999) anything would be fine
Great choices! Do you prefer comedies similar to those, or are you open to other genres as well?
I'm definitely leaning towards comedies like those. I enjoy humor that has a bit of heart and quirky characters.

Got it! Here are some comedy recommendations that feature quirky characters and humor with heart:

8. Ferris Bueller's Day Off
9. Hot Fuzz
10. Zombieland

I appreciate the suggestions, but I'm really looking for something specific. There's a film that features a lovable, unconventional uncle who takes care of his niece and nephew while navigating some hilarious situations. It has a great mix of humor and heart, with memorable characters and funny moments.
